channel.title: Mooc on Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Mooc on Stuff

item.title: Didaktics of media: Designing MOOCs
item.description: This blog post is one part of the series “learning diary” for a course at my university. Goals: Based on the title for that unit I assume we will learn something about designing MOOC. The linked articleÂ on the other hand, features a paper about the Tech Ed Revolution, which “will be the Learner Revolution”. It goes on and on about investors needing to put money in education (either traditional education or start ups) and how these start ups could fuel the next learning revolution.
